Articles.Content: Where can I find the Kopernicus thread? I can't find it on google. Really, i tried! -.-

On 7.5.2016 at 11:52 AM, ApertureGaming said:

Where can I find the Kopernicus thread? I can't find it on google. Really, i tried! -.-

Just because it's useful to know:

In contrast to the old forums, these new ones have a search function that actually works. So you don't need Google anymore.

Go to the search box at the top right. Input a word that you know exists in the title of the thread you want to find. For example, "Kopernicus".
To the left, a dropdown menu will have popped out, currently reading "All Content". Click it, select "Topics" from the menu.
Finally, start the search by clicking the magnifying glass icon (or clicking into the text field again and hitting enter).

For me, this turned up the Kopernicus mod thread as the first hit.
